00036 #ifndef DYNAMIC_WATCHED_OR_NEW_H
00037 #define DYNAMIC_WATCHED_OR_NEW_H

00039 #include "../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"

00048 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl;
00049 #define P(x)
00050 
00051 // For reverse_constraint we need an and
00052 #include "dynamic_new_and.h"
00053 
00054 struct Dynamic_OR : public ParentConstraint
00055 {
00056   virtual string constraint_name()
00057     { return "Dynamic OR:"; }
00058 
00059 
00060   Reversible<bool> full_propagate_called;
00061   bool constraint_locked;
00062 
00063   int assign_size;
00064 
00065   int propagated_constraint;
00066 
00067   int watched_constraint[2];
00068 
00069   Dynamic_OR(StateObj* _stateObj, vector<AbstractConstraint*> _con) :
00070     ParentConstraint(_stateObj, _con), full_propagate_called(_stateObj, false), constraint_locked(false),
00071     assign_size(-1), propagated_constraint(-1)
00072     {
00073       size_t max_size = 0;
00074       for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00075         max_size = max(max_size, child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton()->size());
00076       assign_size = max_size * 2;
00077     }
00078 
00079   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00080   {
00081     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00082     {
00083       if(child_constraints[i]->check_assignment(v + start_of_constraint[i],
00084          child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton()->size()))
00085          return true;
00086     }
00087     return false;
00088   }
00089 
00090   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00091   {
00092     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00093     {
00094       bool flag=child_constraints[i]->get_satisfying_assignment(assignment);
00095       if(flag)
00096       {
00097         // Fix up assignment
00098         for(int j = 0; j < assignment.size(); ++j)
00099           assignment[j].first += start_of_constraint[i];
00100         return true;
00101       }
00102     }
00103     return false;
00104   }
00105 
00106 
00107   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00108   {
00109     vector<AnyVarRef> vecs;
00110     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00111     {
00112       vector<AnyVarRef>* var_ptr = child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton();
00113       vecs.insert(vecs.end(), var_ptr->begin(), var_ptr->end());
00114     }
00115     return vecs;
00116   }
00117 
00118   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count()
00119   {
00120     return assign_size * 2;
00121   }
00122 
00123   virtual void special_check()
00124   {
00125     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00126     constraint_locked = false;
00127     P("Full propagating: " << propagated_constraint);
00128     child_constraints[propagated_constraint]->full_propagate();
00129     full_propagate_called = true;
00130   }
00131 
00132   virtual void special_unlock()
00133   {
00134     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00135     constraint_locked = false;
00136   }
00137 
00138   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta domain)
00139   {
00140     //PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchedOR);
00141     P("Static propagate start");
00142     if(constraint_locked)
00143       return;
00144 
00145     if(full_propagate_called)
00146     {
00147       P("Already doing static full propagate");
00148       pair<int,int> childTrigger = getChildStaticTrigger(i);
00149       P("Got trigger: " << i << ", maps to: " << childTrigger.first << "." << childTrigger.second);
00150       if(childTrigger.first == propagated_constraint)
00151       {
00152         P("Passing trigger" << childTrigger.second << "on");
00153         child_constraints[propagated_constraint]->propagate(childTrigger.second, domain);
00154       }
00155     }
00156   }
00157 
00158   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* trig)
00159   {
00160     //PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchedOr);
00161     P("Prop");
00162     P("Current: " << watched_constraint[0] << " . " << watched_constraint[1]);
00163     P("FullPropOn: " << (bool)full_propagate_called << ", on: " << propagated_constraint);
00164     P("Locked:" << constraint_locked);
00165     if(constraint_locked)
00166       return;
00167 
00168     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00169 
00170     P("Trig: " << trig - dt);
00171 
00172     if(trig >= dt && trig < dt + assign_size * 2)
00173     {
00174       if(full_propagate_called)
00175         return;
00176 
00177       int tripped_constraint = (trig - dt) / assign_size;
00178       int other_constraint = 1 - tripped_constraint;
00179       P("Tripped: " << tripped_constraint << ":" << watched_constraint[tripped_constraint]);
00180       D_ASSERT(tripped_constraint == 0 || tripped_constraint == 1);
00181 
00182       bool flag;
00183       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment_try, child_constraints[watched_constraint[tripped_constraint]]);
00184       if(flag)
00185       { // Found new support without having to move.
00186         watch_assignment(child_constraints[watched_constraint[tripped_constraint]],
00187                          dt + tripped_constraint * assign_size, assignment_try);
00188         for(int i = 0; i < assignment_try.size(); ++i)
00189           P(assignment_try[i].first << "." << assignment_try[i].second << "  ");
00190         P(" -- Fixed, returning");
00191         return;
00192       }
00193 
00194       const size_t cons_s = child_constraints.size();
00195 
00196       int loop_start = watched_constraint[tripped_constraint] + 1;
00197       int skip_pos = watched_constraint[other_constraint];
00198 
00199       for(int i = loop_start; i < cons_s; ++i)
00200       {
00201         if(i != skip_pos)
00202         {
00203           GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[i]);
00204           if(flag)
00205           {
00206             watch_assignment(child_constraints[i], dt + tripped_constraint * assign_size, assignment);
00207             watched_constraint[tripped_constraint] = i;
00208             P("New support. Switch " << tripped_constraint << " to " << i);
00209             return;
00210           }
00211         }
00212       }
00213 
00214       for(int i = 0; i < loop_start - 1; ++i)
00215         {
00216           if(i != skip_pos)
00217           {
00218             GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[i]);
00219             if(flag)
00220             {
00221               watch_assignment(child_constraints[i], dt + tripped_constraint * assign_size, assignment);
00222               watched_constraint[tripped_constraint] = i;
00223               P("New support. Switch " << tripped_constraint << " to " << i);
00224               return;
00225             }
00226           }
00227         }
00228 
00229       P("Start propagating " << watched_constraint[other_constraint]);
00230       // Need to propagate!
00231       propagated_constraint = watched_constraint[other_constraint];
00232       //the following may be necessary for correctness for some constraints
00233 #ifdef SLOW_WOR
00234       constraint_locked = true;
00235       getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00236 #else
00237       child_constraints[propagated_constraint]->full_propagate();
00238       full_propagate_called = true;
00239 #endif
00240       return;
00241     }
00242 
00243 
00244     if(full_propagate_called && getChildDynamicTrigger(trig) == propagated_constraint)
00245     {
00246       P("Propagating child");
00247       child_constraints[propagated_constraint]->propagate(trig);
00248     }
00249     else
00250     {
00251       P("Clean old trigger");
00252       // This is an optimisation.
00253       releaseTrigger(stateObj, trig);
00254     }
00255   }
00256 
00257   void watch_assignment(AbstractConstraint* con, DynamicTrigger* dt, box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00258   {
00259     vector<AnyVarRef>& vars = *(con->get_vars_singleton());
00260     D_ASSERT(assignment.size() <= assign_size);
00261     for(int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00262       vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(dt + i, DomainRemoval, assignment[i].second);
00263   }
00264 
00265   virtual void full_propagate()
00266   {
00267     P("Full Propagate")
00268     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00269 
00270     // Clean up triggers
00271     for(int i = 0; i < assign_size * 2; ++i)
00272       releaseTrigger(stateObj, dt + i);
00273 
00274     int loop = 0;
00275 
00276     bool found_watch = false;
00277 
00278     while(loop < child_constraints.size() && !found_watch)
00279     {
00280       bool flag;
00281       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[loop]);
00282       if(flag)
00283       {
00284         found_watch = true;
00285         watched_constraint[0] = loop;
00286         watch_assignment(child_constraints[loop], dt, assignment);
00287         for(int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00288           P(assignment[i].first << "." << assignment[i].second << "  ");
00289       }
00290       else
00291         loop++;
00292     }
00293 
00294     if(found_watch == false)
00295     {
00296       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00297       return;
00298     }
00299 
00300     P(" -- Found watch 0: " << loop);
00301     loop++;
00302 
00303     found_watch = false;
00304 
00305     while(loop < child_constraints.size() && !found_watch)
00306     {
00307       bool flag;
00308       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[loop]);
00309       if(flag)
00310       {
00311         found_watch = true;
00312         watched_constraint[1] = loop;
00313         watch_assignment(child_constraints[loop], dt + assign_size, assignment);
00314         for(int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00315           P(assignment[i].first << "." << assignment[i].second << "  ");
00316         P(" -- Found watch 1: " << loop);
00317         return;
00318       }
00319       else
00320         loop++;
00321     }
00322 
00323     if(found_watch == false)
00324     {
00325       propagated_constraint = watched_constraint[0];
00326       constraint_locked = true;
00327       getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00328     }
00329 
00330   }
00331 
00332   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00333   { // and of the reverse of all the child constraints..
00334       vector<AbstractConstraint*> con;
00335       for(int i=0; i<child_constraints.size(); i++)
00336       {
00337           con.push_back(child_constraints[i]->reverse_constraint());
00338       }
00339       return new Dynamic_AND(stateObj, con);
00340   }
00341 };
00342 
00343 inline AbstractConstraint*
00344 BuildCT_WATCHED_NEW_OR(StateObj* stateObj, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00345 {
00346   vector<AbstractConstraint*> cons;
00347   for(int i = 0; i < bl.internal_constraints.size(); ++i)
00348     cons.push_back(build_constraint(stateObj, bl.internal_constraints[i]));
00349   return new Dynamic_OR(stateObj, cons);
00350 }
